name: Bailout Bonanza
description:
Beat the Bailout on your iPhone!

Are you angered by the million dollar bonuses, corporate jets, fancy junkets and other executive perks funded by the Bank Bailout? Wish you could stop this “Bailout Bonanza?” A new iPhone game will give you the opportunity to do just that.

Bailout Bonanza Features:

* Touch or Tilt Control.
* Classic Arcade Action.
* Automatic Save of Current Game.
* 'Infinite' Levels of FUN!
* High Scores.

Bailout Bonanza is a fast, fun and furious arcade-action game where you try to catch bundles of cash being thrown away by a greedy executive. Classic arcade gameplay meets THE issue of the day. Taking advantage of the iPhone's and iPod touch’s cool control features, Bailout Bonanza gives you the option to play by swiping your finger across the screen or by tilting the phone. Catch the money bags before they hit the ground. Watch out for the occasional shoe toss! If you miss a moneybag or get hit by a shoe you lose one of your baskets, but don't worry ... you can earn it back.

Channel your frustration over Bailout abuse.

PlayScreen is committed to your satisfaction. If you have any suggestions or problems, please contact us at help@playscreen.com

We take your comments seriously so don't hesitate to let us know about your experiences with our games.
